text: The Egyptian people are one fabric and the Egyptians are before the law and the constitution are all equal and have the same duties. # The President # The Trustees of the Library of Alexandria

I reject the inadvertent talk of some about a Christian minority. We are all de facto citizens of the country before the law and the Constitution. # President # The Trustees of the Library of Alexandria
I reject any discrimination on the basis of sex, color or religion as stipulated in our new Constitution # President # The Trustees of the Library of Alexandria
We believe that Renaissance is not the responsibility of an individual or an elite, but the will of a free people. # President # Trustees of the Library of Alexandria
The rejection of the new and the past in a world dominated by change is only a surrender to a slow suicide # President # The Trustees of the Library of Alexandria
Separation from the heritage and root uprooting is only a call to get lost and lost # President # Trustees - Library of Alexandria
We are proud of our Egyptian culture and we are proud of the history of ancient Egypt, which has its roots for thousands of years. # President # The Trustees of the Library of Alexandria

The Bibliotheca Alexandrina is a brilliant name in history, coupled with a unique institution that painted a comprehensive framework for human knowledge over five centuries and embodied the cultural communication between peoples

Azerbaijan is one of those countries that is based on its internal capabilities and provides its economic and political development.
There is no sign of the financial and economic crisis in Azerbaijan at the peak of the crisis.
At a time when some of the European countries' credit ratings are down, Azerbaijan's rating rises.
This year salaries and pensions will be increased. I think that the outcome of our socially-oriented policy will be very positive.
Of course, first of all, we address the problems of IDPs in dealing with social issues, and we are constantly dealing with these issues.
We have become a serious international factor. Political initiatives can not be solved without our consent, without our consent.
We build relationships with all countries on the principles of mutual respect and non-interference in each other's work.
We know how to manage our country. We do not need advice from outside.
We are a strong country. There is unity, unity between the people and power.
Reforms in the economic sphere, as well as social issues, strengthen us.
We need to increase the production of competitive products. Increase both export and at the same time, the internal (cont) http://t.co/kqGymLN3Ys
We need to provide domestic market with competitive products that Azerbaijani citizens (cont) http://t.co/i9PV3TDdb2
Recommendations made by the state and government to entrepreneurs will promote the production of competitive products.
Work is underway to organize their education at a high level in order to provide young people with jobs.
The biggest problem facing young families in life is housing problem.
I think that mortgage lending mechanisms should be improved and revised.
Certain reforms are underway in this direction. I still think that much work should be done and the amount allocated to the mortgage should be increased.
speaks at the Catshuis with President Kikwete from Tanzania about economic relations. Photo: http://t.co/ZcbTvTJFni
We must maximize the available space for corruption and bribery.
Officer-citizen communication should be minimized in this direction. We need to apply the experience of developed countries to a maximum extent.
Therefore, the development of the ICT sector in Azerbaijan should be and will be more emphasized.
If we want to become a developed country, we must fight more and more against corruption and bribery.
Responsibility of civil servants should also increase. Public officials should serve and do the public.
A civil servant should be an example for every citizen in society. Modesty, purity, and service to the motherland.
Public officials should be elected. Their professionalism and their spiritual qualities should be at a high level.
Officer-citizen relations should be based on respect. Where there are flaws, violations, of course (cont) http://t.co/8f1lpcG34U
